com.milk.uberchat.gui
Class ChannelsPanel

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--java.awt.Component
        |
        +--java.awt.Container
              |
              +--javax.swing.JComponent
                    |
                    +--javax.swing.JScrollPane
                          |
                          +--com.milk.uberchat.gui.ChannelsPanel
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, ChannelHolderListener, ContainsTree, EntityListener, java.util.EventListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, LocusListener, java.awt.MenuContainer, javax.swing.ScrollPaneConstants, java.io.Serializable
public class ChannelsPanel
extends javax.swing.JScrollPane
implements ContainsTree, ChannelHolderListener, LocusListener, EntityListener

This is a panel which keeps track of all the active channels for a particular identity, with sub-trees for the users in each channel.

Author:
Dan Bornstein, danfuzz@milk.com
, Copyright 1999 Dan Bornstein, all rights reserved.
See Also:
Serialized Form

panelClosing

private void panelClosing()
This is called via a WindowListener when the window that this panel is in is getting closed. It makes the panel stop getting EntityEvents.
